page.title: 10EDUCATION IN ILMINGTON
page.content: The local{village school}has 72 pupils three full-time teachers including the headmaster.Children start school in the September before the reach their{ {fifth}birthday, and they remain at school for seven years until they are{ {eleven}years old. As unemployment has increased and more students chase fewer and fewer places in higher education, parents have placed much more emphasis on the{11+ {selection procedure by exam}which is operated at Ilmington School.A verbal reasoning test is used together with the{11+}exam to determine the secondary school appropriate to each child.On average, 12% of all children are selected to attend the two Stratford Grammar Schools.The majority of children from Ilmington attend Shipston High School.
